alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 2:01PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Owyhee County through 230 PM MDT... At 201 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Black Rock Mountain, or 18 miles northwest of Jarbidge, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sevy Falls and Poison Butte around 220 PM MDT. Middle Butte around 230 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
